Package org.glassfish.jersey.linking

Class Summary
DeclarativeLinkingFeature A feature to enable the declarative linking functionality
InjectLink.Util  
 

Enum Summary
InjectLink.Style Styles of URI supported
 

Annotation Types Summary
Binding Specifies the binding between a URI template parameter and a bean property.
InjectLink Specifies a link injection target in a returned representation bean.
InjectLink.Extension  
InjectLinks Used to request the addition of a set of links, can be used for both link headers on a Class or injection into a List or Link[] property.
